TopicTitle: 11/13/2015 Space Craft Friday - The Update Edition

Articles.Content:
Well its that time again, and with the release of 1.0.5, there has been a flood of new crafts. I have chose a few of the crafts which I believe are the best of this week! I tried to be fair as possible, but I have stuck to stock because I am a stock player, and I tested all of these. They are in no particular order, and all of these crafts are outstanding!

Who are you to decide this, I hear you asking, and here's the answer: No one. I am official in any way, shape, or form. If you're unhappy with my decision, we can work something out. This is just my opinion, since there's no objective way to judge "Quality" of crafts.

If anyone feels that their craft is missed because of any kind of time-zone difference, or any kind of difference in when spacecraft Fridays is put up, tell me.

If your craft is really good and was made before, and someone posts in it within that week, then it will be considered. Just to clarify, I am not encouraging necros for the sake of bumping your craft.

MajorJim's Duna Direct

This beautiful replica is a bit high in part count, but is incredibly realistic and has ingenious part uses, especially with the HAB door. While it is not 1.0.5, it was just too good not to get featured.

pTrevTrevs' P-26 Peashooter

This plane replica has a very cool custom cockpit, as well as a highly accurate propeller (although fake) and even a bomb! It is a great plane and is a joy to fly around the sky.

Ghostbuzzer7's Me 262 Replica

A great replica or a great plane in real life, this craft features bombs as well, and is the first 1.0.5 specific on the list.

Azimech's SY1 Mintaka Super Yacht

This wonderful boat comes with many great aspects, including a walk around deck and infinite range thanks to its built in ISRU. It also looks absolutely fantastic, and is a boat!

Pandoras Kitten's PBK-1 Katarina

This mock plane of the very famous PBY Catalina is a very cool craft, combining a boat and plane into one. It flies great, and is incredibly functional with the new 1.0.5 water physics.

FCISuperGuy's Kerbal Transportation System "Challenger"

I could not go through 1.0.5 crafts without having at least one space shuttle, and here is the one I like the best. It has a great orbiter, and is a wonderful mix of realism, and KSP ways.

Thats all for my SCF, I hope you enjoyed. There will be no honorable mentions, because there has been such flurry of 1.0.5 crafts that there are just TOO many to mention.

Edited November 14, 2015 by Bubbadevlin

Wow, thanks for the feature! The P-26's thread itself didn't get that much attention, so I figured people didn't like it that much, but here it is anyway!

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I've been featured in every SCF for the last four weeks, I'm starting to feel a little guilty...
Lol, didn't notice that, and well i personally liked the design, and it probably just got swallowed up on the 1.0.5 stuff. It also flew like a dream, so yea

Ooh! The space shuttle and Pbk-1 is really neat, also very neat of how people are using the new physics to make cool boats and submarines now. Love the new update and all of the new creations flowing in!

Thank you for choosing my craft Bubbadevlin. I would like to say, pTrevTrevs' P-26 Peashooter is so cute!

Well done all who got featured and thank you for reminding me to check that it survived the update.

MJ
Wow... Never thought I'd see my craft featured on here when I opened this up. Thanks a lot for the feature! It took me far too long to balance that thing, and it feels good to know it paid off.
